alert.note: Alert for Monmouth; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:03PM EDT until July 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL OCEAN AND MONMOUTH COUNTIES... At 402 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Collingwood Park, or 8 miles west of Asbury Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Branch, Asbury Park, Sandy Hook, Lakewood, Middletown, Howell, Marlboro, Tinton Falls, Holmdel, Red Bank, Keansburg, Matawan, Highlands, Farmingdale, Allenwood, East Freehold, West Freehold, Adelphia, Vista Center and Elberon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 20 and 34. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 93 and 119. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
